name: Dragon Quest Rush
description:
This game was done for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2020. It is my first game. I used all the art from flappy dragon. I requested permission to @mobypixel which actually told me that I didn't need to credit him. But I thought I do it anymays!

You can find the code at https://github.com/marcoandre1/mygame

Finally, thanks to DragonRuby Team to give away free licenses. It was really fun and a nice experience.

Comments are always welcomed! Thanks!
